group_1.textRight: *Sigh...* [chara:304601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:304601:cheek_0][chara:304601:eyeClose_0][chara:304601:lipSynch_1]We managed to beat it.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you very much for your help.
Keeping this little one away from the fighting was somewhat of a struggle.
...Although since it stayed in a safe place...
I was worried for no reason.

group_1.textRight: How did you get into that situation anyway...?

group_1.textLeft: U-Ughh...

group_1.textRight: [chara:810100:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]!?
(...Hm, it hid...?)

group_1.textLeft: H-Huh...? I saw something just now that looked like@a white cat...

group_1.textRight: (This girl has the potential needed to be a@magical girl...)

group_1.textLeft: Disregarding that, where am I...?
Ryo-san, for now we should...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, got it, let's finish tidying things up here first.
Alright then...
Please tell me what the situation at that time was.

group_1.textLeft: Fufu, this is like an interview.@It's rather nerve wracking.

group_1.textRight: ...Why were Tokiwa-chan and userName
in the labyrinth together?
Midori-san's never heard of you being friends.

group_1.textLeft: Indeed... I wouldn't call us friends.
Though it may look harmless, it remains a Kyubey.
I didn't plan on interacting with it any more than@was necessary.

group_1.textRight: Then...

group_1.textLeft: But despite that,
it followed me into the labyrinth...
so I couldn't ignore it.
In addition, userName did do a small favor for me.

group_1.textRight: Huh, so this is Tokiwa-chan's way of returning@the favor.

group_1.textLeft: It wasn't anything that significant.
userName-san returned
a flower arrangement flower that I witlessly@dropped...
That's all.

group_1.textRight: One flower... userName sure is conscientious.

group_1.textLeft: Though being honest is a virtue...
Ryo-san.
If you encounter userName-san in the future...
there's something I want you to relay.

group_1.textRight: You want me to be a messenger? No problem.

group_1.textLeft: Quite a few girls...
must be wary of userName-san, or Kyubey more@precisely.
It would be best if it stopped visiting unfriendly@magical girls.

group_1.textRight: Huh, userName has been doing that.
...Because it was stealthily active at night,
I thought it was for sure trying to contract new@magical girls.

group_1.textLeft: Fufu, it doesn't have that type of power.
It even appears to try remaining undiscovered
by girls with magical girl potential.

group_1.textRight: (Oh... Was that what it was?)
[chara:810100:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]!?
(...Hm, it hid...?)

group_1.textLeft: H-Huh...? I saw something just now that looked like@a white cat...

group_1.textRight: (This girl has the potential needed to be a@magical girl...)
(This was all Midori-san jumping to conclusions... Although...)
(I can write a good article with this.)

group_1.narration: "A true story! userName dashes through the nighttime city."
Late at night, a white silhouette runs through deserted streets,@the sole little Kyubey that exists in Kamihama... userName.
Under the cover of night, it deceives girls,@urging them to contract...
Or at least that's what I used to think.@userName apparently no longer has the powers Kyubey holds.
Even when treated coldly, it simply earnestly visits magical girls,@seemingly to build a friendly relationship with them.

group_1.textLeft: Waah, sure enough it is trying to get along with everyone!
userName's been doing its best.
Huh? What's up with you two?

group_1.textRight: There were just a few things on my mind.

group_1.textCenter: Recently, I keep forgetting this little one is@technically a Kyubey.
